content: In docs#add_group_filter_basis_of_comm the third (resp. fourth) field is called mul (resp. inv), but wouldn't it more reasonable to call it add (resp. sub)? Also, in the doc at the end I think we should have "add_group_filter_basis constructor in the additive commutative group case", no?
This is generated by to_additive so there's not much you can do about the field names.
The docstring can be tweaked easily though :)
Oh yes, I just realised by clicking on the source. I will simply pull a doc PR then.
